author: Bob Davis
title: China Plans Trade Offers for U.S. Envoys on High-Stakes Trip
text:
China is rolling out the red carpet for a visiting U.S. trade delegation this week, including a session with President Xi Jinping and pledges to cut tariffs and ease regulations, but it will likely take more than that to impress the visiting Americans and head off a looming trade war.
It will be a high-stakes meeting, starting Thursday. U.S.-China economic relations have sunk to their lowest point in decades with the U.S., angry over alleged Chinese pressure on U.S. firms to transfer technology to Chinese partners and other...
